name: BatMania
description:
You are stranded on an island filled with bats. The maze is infinite nobody can escape it until he founds one of the secret ways to exit out of it. They can make them selves Ultra bats or Mega Bats. Which will move even faster and attack more. You can get Armor and Gold coins from treasure chests and if lucky to find pirate bats you can kill them and get more coins.

You can kill them by pressing Q and move using A, W, S & D.
